00053 MMRESULT timerid = 0;
00054 
00055 PRIVATE CRITICAL_SECTION CS_CW,
00056                  UPDATE_OK;
00057 PRIVATE LPCRITICAL_SECTION cs_cw,
00058                    update_ok;
00059 
00060 REAL SAMP_RATE = 48000.0;
00061 
00062 // # times key is sampled per sec
00063 // > 64 requires root on Linux
00064 int key_poll_period = 1;
00065 
00066 //#define RTC_RATE (64)
00067 BOOLEAN HiPerformance = FALSE;
00068 
00069 // # samples generated during 1 clock tick at RTC_RATE
00070 //#define TONE_SIZE (SAMP_RATE / RTC_RATE)
00071 unsigned int TONE_SIZE = 48;
00072 unsigned int SIZEBUF = 1024;
00073 
00074 // ring buffer size; > 1 sec at this sr
00075 //#define RING_SIZE (1<<020)
00076 //#define RING_SIZE (1<<017)
00077 #define RING_SIZE 16384
00078 
00079 KeyerState ks;
00080 KeyerLogic kl;
00081 
00082 static pthread_t play,
00083           key,
00084           timer;
00085 sem_t clock_fired,
00086       keyer_started,
00087       poll_fired;
00088 
00089 ringb_float_t *lring,
00090              *rring;
00091 
00092 CWToneGen gen;
00093 static BOOLEAN playing = FALSE,
00094     iambic = FALSE,
00095     bug = FALSE,
00096     cw_ring_reset = FALSE;
00097 static REAL wpm = 18.0,
00098     freq = 600.0,
00099     ramp = 5.0,
00100     gain = 0.0;

00104 #ifndef INTERLEAVED
00105 DttSP_EXP void CWtoneExchange( float *bufl, float *bufr, int nframes )
00106 {
00107     size_t numsamps,
00108            bytesize = sizeof( float ) * nframes;
00109 
00110     if ( cw_ring_reset )
00111     {
00112         size_t reset_size = max( SIZEBUF, ( unsigned ) nframes );
00113 
00114         cw_ring_reset = FALSE;
00115         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00116         ringb_float_restart( lring, reset_size );
00117         ringb_float_restart( rring, reset_size );
00118         memset( bufl, 0, nframes * sizeof( REAL ) );
00119         memset( bufr, 0, nframes * sizeof( REAL ) );
00120         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00121         return;
00122     }
00123     if ( ( numsamps = ringb_float_read_space( lring ) ) < ( size_t ) nframes )
00124     {
00125         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00126         memset( bufl, 0, bytesize );
00127         memset( bufr, 0, bytesize );
00128         if ( numsamps != 0 )
00129         {
00130             ringb_float_read( lring, bufl, nframes - numsamps );
00131             ringb_float_read( rring, bufr, nframes - numsamps );
00132         }
00133         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00134     }
00135     else
00136     {
00137         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00138         ringb_float_read( lring, bufl, nframes );
00139         ringb_float_read( rring, bufr, nframes );
00140         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00141     }
00142 
00143 }
00144 
00145 // generated tone -> output ringbuffer
00146 void send_tone( void )
00147 {
00148     if ( ringb_float_write_space( lring ) < TONE_SIZE )
00149     {
00150         cw_ring_reset = TRUE;
00151     }
00152     else
00153     {
00154         int i;
00155 
00156         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00157         for ( i = 0; i < gen->size; i++ )
00158         {
00159             float l = ( float ) CXBreal( gen->buf, i ),
00160                 r = ( float ) CXBimag( gen->buf, i );
00161 
00162             ringb_float_write( lring, ( float * ) &l, 1 );
00163             ringb_float_write( rring, ( float * ) &r, 1 );
00164         }
00165         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 // silence -> output ringbuffer
00170 void send_silence( void )
00171 {
00172     if ( ringb_float_write_space( lring ) < TONE_SIZE )
00173     {
00174         cw_ring_reset = TRUE;
00175     }
00176     else
00177     {
00178         int i;
00179 
00180         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00181         for ( i = 0; i < gen->size; i++ )
00182         {
00183             float zero = 0.0;
00184 
00185             ringb_float_write( lring, &zero, 1 );
00186             ringb_float_write( rring, &zero, 1 );
00187         }
00188         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00189     }
00190 }
00191 
00192 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 
00194 #else
00195 DttSP_EXP void CWtoneExchange( float *bufl, int nframes, int numchans )
00196 {
00197     size_t numframes,
00198            bytesize = sizeof( float ) * nframes * numchans;
00199     float *locbuf = bufl;
00200 
00201     if ( ( numframes =
00202            ringb_float_read_space( lring ) ) < ( size_t ) numchans * nframes )
00203     {
00204         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00205         memset( bufl, 0, bytesize );
00206         if ( numframes != 0 )
00207         {
00208             int i,
00209                 j;
00210 
00211             numframes /= numchans;
00212 
00213             for ( i = 0; i < nframes - ( int ) numframes; i++ )
00214             {
00215                 float l,
00216                       r;
00217 
00218                 ringb_float_read( lring, &l, 1 );
00219                 ringb_float_read( lring, &r, 1 );
00220                 for ( j = 0; j < numchans; j += 2, locbuf += 2 )
00221                 {
00222                     locbuf[0] = l;
00223                     locbuf[1] = r;
00224                 }
00225             }
00226         }
00227         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00228     }
00229     else
00230     {
00231         int i,
00232             j;
00233 
00234         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00235         for ( i = 0; i < nframes; i++ )
00236         {
00237             float l,
00238                   r;
00239 
00240             ringb_float_read( lring, &l, 1 );
00241             ringb_float_read( lring, &r, 1 );
00242             for ( j = 0; j < numchans; j += 2, locbuf += 2 )
00243             {
00244                 locbuf[0] = l;
00245                 locbuf[1] = r;
00246             }
00247         }
00248         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00249     }
00250 }
00251 
00252 // generated tone -> output ringbuffer
00253 void send_tone( void )
00254 {
00255     if ( ringb_float_write_space( lring ) < 2 * TONE_SIZE )
00256     {
00257         //write(2, "overrun tone\n", 13);
00258         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00259         ringb_float_restart( lring, SIZEBUF );
00260         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00261     }
00262     else
00263     {
00264         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00265         ringb_float_write( lring, ( float * ) CXBbase( gen->buf ),
00266                            2 * gen->size );
00267         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00268     }
00269 }
00270 
00271 // silence -> output ringbuffer
00272 void send_silence( void )
00273 {
00274     if ( ringb_float_write_space( lring ) < 2 * TONE_SIZE )
00275     {
00276         //write(2, "overrun zero\n", 13);
00277         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00278         ringb_float_restart( lring, SIZEBUF );
00279         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00280     }
00281     else
00282     {
00283         int i;
00284 
00285         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00286         for ( i = 0; i < 2 * gen->size; i++ )
00287         {
00288             float zero = 0.0;
00289 
00290             ringb_float_write( lring, &zero, 1 );
00291         }
00292         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00293     }
00294 }
00295 
00296 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00297 
00298 #endif /*  */
00299 //------------------------------------------------------------
00300 
00301 // sound/silence generation
00302 // tone turned on/off asynchronously
00303 
00304 CALLBACK timer_callback( UINT uTimerID, UINT uMsg, DWORD_PTR dwUser,
00305                          DWORD_PTR dw1, DWORD_PTR dw2 )
00306 {
00307     sem_post( &poll_fired );
00308 }
00309 
00310 DttSP_EXP void sound_thread_keyd( void )
00311 {
00312     for ( ;; )
00313     {
00314         sem_wait( &clock_fired );
00315 
00316         if ( playing )
00317         {
00318 
00319             // CWTone keeps playing for awhile after it's turned off,
00320             // in order to allow for a decay envelope;
00321             // returns FALSE when it's actually done.
00322             playing = CWTone( gen );
00323             EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00324             send_tone(  );
00325             LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00326         }
00327         else
00328         {
00329             EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00330             send_silence(  );
00331             // only let updates run when we've just generated silence
00332             LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00333         }
00334     }
00335 
00336     pthread_exit( 0 );
00337 }
00338 
00339 BOOLEAN read_key( REAL del, BOOLEAN dot, BOOLEAN dash )
00340 {
00341     extern BOOLEAN read_straight_key( KeyerState ks, BOOLEAN keyed );
00342     extern BOOLEAN read_iambic_key( KeyerState ks, BOOLEAN dot, BOOLEAN dash,
00343                                     KeyerLogic kl, REAL ticklen );
00344 
00345     if ( bug )
00346     {
00347         if ( dash )
00348             return read_straight_key( ks, dash );
00349         else
00350             return read_iambic_key( ks, dot, FALSE, kl, del );
00351     }
00352     if ( iambic )
00353         return read_iambic_key( ks, dot, dash, kl, del );
00354     return read_straight_key( ks, dot | dash );
00355 }
00356 
00358 BOOLEAN dotkey = FALSE;
00359 PRIVATE BOOLEAN __inline whichkey( BOOLEAN dot, BOOLEAN dash )
00360 {
00361     if ( dotkey )
00362         return dot;
00363     return dash;
00364 }
00365 DttSP_EXP void SetWhichKey( BOOLEAN isdot )
00366 {
00367     if ( isdot )
00368         dotkey = TRUE;
00369     else
00370         dotkey = FALSE;
00371 }
00372 DttSP_EXP void key_thread_process( REAL del, BOOLEAN dash, BOOLEAN dot,
00373                                    BOOLEAN keyprog )
00374 {
00375     BOOLEAN keydown;
00376     extern BOOLEAN read_straight_key( KeyerState ks, BOOLEAN keyed );
00377 
00378     // read key; tell keyer elapsed time since last call
00379     if ( !keyprog )
00380         keydown = read_key( del, dot, dash );
00381     else
00382         keydown = read_straight_key( ks, whichkey( dot, dash ) );
00383 
00384     if ( !playing && keydown )
00385         CWToneOn( gen ), playing = TRUE;
00386     else if ( playing && !keydown )
00387         CWToneOff( gen );
00388 
00389     sem_post( &clock_fired );
00390 }
00391 
00392 DttSP_EXP BOOLEAN KeyerPlaying(  )
00393 {
00394     return playing;
00395 }

00399 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerBug( BOOLEAN bg )
00400 {
00401     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00402     if ( bg )
00403     {
00404         iambic = FALSE;
00405         ks->flag.mdlmdB = FALSE;
00406         ks->flag.memory.dah = FALSE;
00407         ks->flag.memory.dit = FALSE;
00408         bug = TRUE;
00409     }
00410     else
00411         bug = FALSE;
00412     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00413 
00414 }
00415 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerSpeed( REAL speed )
00416 {
00417     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00418     wpm = ks->wpm = speed;
00419     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00420 }
00421 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerWeight( int newweight )
00422 {
00423     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00424     ks->weight = newweight;
00425     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00426 }
00427 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerIambic( BOOLEAN setit )
00428 {
00429     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00430     if ( setit )
00431     {
00432         iambic = TRUE;
00433         ks->flag.mdlmdB = TRUE;
00434         ks->flag.memory.dah = TRUE;
00435         ks->flag.memory.dit = TRUE;
00436     }
00437     else
00438     {
00439         iambic = FALSE;
00440         ks->flag.mdlmdB = FALSE;
00441         ks->flag.memory.dah = FALSE;
00442         ks->flag.memory.dit = FALSE;
00443     }
00444     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00445 }
00446 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerFreq( REAL newfreq )
00447 {
00448     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00449     freq = newfreq;
00450     setCWToneGenVals( gen, gain, freq, ramp, ramp );
00451     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00452 }
00453 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerGain( REAL newgain )
00454 {
00455     if ( ( newgain >= 0.0 ) && ( newgain <= 1.0 ) )
00456     {
00457         EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00458         gain = ( REAL ) ( 20.0 * log10( newgain ) );
00459         setCWToneGenVals( gen, gain, freq, ramp, ramp );
00460         LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00461     }
00462 
00463 }
00464 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerRamp( REAL newramp )
00465 {
00466     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00467     ramp = newramp;
00468     setCWToneGenVals( gen, gain, freq, ramp, ramp );
00469     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00470 }
00471 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerMode( int newmode )
00472 {
00473     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00474     if ( newmode == 1 )
00475         ks->mode = MODE_B;
00476     if ( newmode == 0 )
00477         ks->mode = MODE_A;
00478     if ( newmode == 2 )
00479         iambic = FALSE;
00480     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00481 }
00482 
00483 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerDeBounce( int db )
00484 {
00485     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00486     ks->debounce = db;
00487     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00488 }

00490 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerRevPdl( BOOLEAN rvp )
00491 {
00492     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00493     ks->flag.revpdl = !rvp;
00494     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00495 }
00496 
00497 /*updateKeyer(REAL nfreq, BOOLEAN niambic, REAL ngain, REAL nramp, REAL nwpm,
00498                         BOOLEAN revpdl, int weight, REAL SampleRate) {
00499         ks->flag.iambic = niambic;
00500         iambic = niambic;
00501         ks->flag.revpdl = revpdl;
00502         ks->weight = weight;
00503         wpm = nwpm;
00504         gain = ngain;
00505         ramp = nramp;
00506         freq = nfreq;
00507         gen->osc.freq = 2.0 * M_PI * freq / SampleRate;
00508 } */
00509 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerPerf( BOOLEAN hiperf )
00510 {
00511     MMRESULT tmp_timer;
00512 
00513     tmp_timer = timerid;
00514     if ( timerid != 0 )
00515     {
00516         EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00517         timeKillEvent( ( UINT ) timerid );
00518         timerid = 0;
00519         Sleep( 11 );
00520         LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00521     }
00522     delCWToneGen( gen );
00523     if ( hiperf )
00524     {
00525         HiPerformance = TRUE;
00526         key_poll_period = 1;
00527         TONE_SIZE = 48;
00528     }
00529     else
00530     {
00531         HiPerformance = FALSE;
00532         key_poll_period = 5;
00533         TONE_SIZE = 240;
00534     }
00535     gen = newCWToneGen( gain, freq, ramp, ramp, TONE_SIZE, SAMP_RATE );
00536     if ( tmp_timer != 0 )
00537     {
00538 #ifndef INTERLEAVED
00539         EnterCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00540         ringb_float_restart( lring, SIZEBUF );
00541         ringb_float_restart( rring, SIZEBUF );
00542         LeaveCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00543 #else
00544         ringb_float_restart( lring, SIZEBUF );
00545 #endif /*  */
00546         if ( ( timerid =
00547                timeSetEvent( key_poll_period, 1,
00548                              ( LPTIMECALLBACK ) timer_callback,
00549                              ( DWORD_PTR ) NULL,
00550                              TIME_PERIODIC ) ) == ( MMRESULT ) NULL )
00551             fprintf( stderr, "Timer failed\n" ), fflush( stderr );
00552 
00553     }
00554 }
00555 DttSP_EXP void NewKeyer( REAL freq, BOOLEAN niambic, REAL gain, REAL ramp,
00556                          REAL wpm, REAL SampleRate )
00557 {
00558 
00559     kl = newKeyerLogic(  );
00560     ks = newKeyerState(  );
00561     ks->flag.iambic = niambic;
00562     ks->flag.revpdl = TRUE;     // depends on port wiring
00563     ks->flag.autospace.khar = ks->flag.autospace.word = FALSE;
00564     ks->flag.mdlmdB = TRUE;
00565     ks->flag.memory.dah = TRUE;
00566     ks->flag.memory.dit = TRUE;
00567     ks->debounce = 1;           // could be more if sampled faster
00568     ks->mode = MODE_B;
00569     ks->weight = 50;
00570     ks->wpm = wpm;
00571     iambic = niambic;
00572     cs_cw = &CS_CW;
00573     InitializeCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00574     update_ok = &UPDATE_OK;
00575     InitializeCriticalSection( update_ok );;
00576 #ifndef INTERLEAVED
00577     lring = ringb_float_create( RING_SIZE );
00578     rring = ringb_float_create( RING_SIZE );
00579 #else
00580     lring = ringb_float_create( 2 * RING_SIZE );
00581 #endif /*  */
00582     sem_init( &clock_fired, 0, 0 );
00583     sem_init( &poll_fired, 0, 0 );
00584     sem_init( &keyer_started, 0, 0 );
00585     if ( HiPerformance )
00586     {
00587         key_poll_period = 1;
00588         TONE_SIZE = 48 * ( int ) ( uni.samplerate / 48000.0 );
00589     }
00590     else
00591     {
00592         key_poll_period = 5;
00593         TONE_SIZE = 240 * ( int ) ( uni.samplerate / 48000.0 );
00594     }
00595     //------------------------------------------------------------
00596 
00597     gen = newCWToneGen( gain, freq, ramp, ramp, TONE_SIZE, SampleRate );
00598 
00599     //------------------------------------------------------------
00600 //  if (timeSetEvent(5,1,(LPTIMECALLBACK)timer_callback,(DWORD_PTR)NULL,TIME_PERIODIC) == (MMRESULT)NULL) {
00601 //        fprintf(stderr,"Timer failed\n"),fflush(stderr);
00602 //  }
00603 }
00604 DttSP_EXP void StartKeyer(  )
00605 {
00606 #ifndef INTERLEAVED
00607     ringb_float_restart( lring, SIZEBUF );
00608     ringb_float_restart( rring, SIZEBUF );
00609 #else
00610     ringb_float_restart( lring, SIZEBUF );
00611 #endif /*  */
00612     if ( ( timerid =
00613            timeSetEvent( key_poll_period, 1,
00614                          ( LPTIMECALLBACK ) timer_callback,
00615                          ( DWORD_PTR ) NULL,
00616                          TIME_PERIODIC ) ) == ( MMRESULT ) NULL )
00617         fprintf( stderr, "Timer failed\n" ), fflush( stderr );
00618     sem_post( &keyer_started );
00619 }
00620 DttSP_EXP void StopKeyer(  )
00621 {
00622     EnterCriticalSection( update_ok );
00623     if ( timerid )
00624         timeKillEvent( ( UINT ) timerid );
00625     LeaveCriticalSection( update_ok );
00626     timerid = 0;
00627 }
00628 
00629 DttSP_EXP BOOLEAN KeyerRunning(  )
00630 {
00631     return ( timerid != 0 );
00632 }
00633 
00634 DttSP_EXP void DeleteKeyer(  )
00635 {
00636     StopKeyer(  );
00637     if ( clock_fired )
00638     {
00639         sem_destroy( &clock_fired );
00640         clock_fired = NULL;
00641     }
00642     if ( poll_fired )
00643     {
00644         sem_destroy( &poll_fired );
00645         poll_fired = NULL;
00646     }
00647     if ( keyer_started )
00648     {
00649         sem_destroy( &keyer_started );
00650         keyer_started = NULL;
00651     }
00652     delCWToneGen( gen );
00653     delKeyerState( ks );
00654     delKeyerLogic( kl );
00655 #ifndef INTERLEAVED
00656     ringb_float_free( lring );
00657     ringb_float_free( rring );
00658 #else
00659     ringb_float_free( lring );
00660 #endif /*  */
00661     if ( cs_cw )
00662     {
00663         DeleteCriticalSection( cs_cw );
00664         cs_cw = NULL;
00665     }
00666 }
00667 DttSP_EXP void KeyerClockFireWait(  )
00668 {
00669     sem_wait( &clock_fired );
00670 }
00671 DttSP_EXP void KeyerClockFireRelease(  )
00672 {
00673     sem_post( &clock_fired );
00674 }
00675 DttSP_EXP void KeyerStartedWait(  )
00676 {
00677     sem_wait( &keyer_started );
00678 }
00679 DttSP_EXP void KeyerStartedRelease(  )
00680 {
00681     sem_post( &keyer_started );
00682 }
00683 DttSP_EXP void PollTimerWait(  )
00684 {
00685     sem_wait( &poll_fired );
00686 }
00687 DttSP_EXP void PollTimerRelease(  )
00688 {
00689     sem_post( &poll_fired );
00690 }
00691 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerResetSize( unsigned int sizer )
00692 {
00693     SIZEBUF = sizer;
00694     cw_ring_reset = TRUE;
00695 }
00696 
00697 DttSP_EXP void CWRingRestart(  )
00698 {
00699     cw_ring_reset = TRUE;
00700 }
00701 
00702 DttSP_EXP void SetKeyerSampleRate( REAL sr )
00703 {
00704     int factor = ( int ) ( sr / 48000.0f );
00705 
00706     if ( HiPerformance )
00707     {
00708         key_poll_period = 1;
00709         TONE_SIZE = 48 * factor;
00710     }
00711     else
00712     {
00713         key_poll_period = 5;
00714         TONE_SIZE = 240 * factor;
00715     }
00716     SIZEBUF = 1024 * factor;
00717 
00718     delCWToneGen( gen );
00719     gen = newCWToneGen( gain, freq, ramp, ramp, TONE_SIZE, sr );
00720 }
00721
